Berena Elkan was a Bhaalspawn berserker who allied herself with Gromnir Il-Khan during the Bhaalspawn crisis in Tethyr during the midâ€“14 century DR.
She wielded a +3 spear in battle, with which she was extremely skilled.
When Saradush was under siege by Yaga-Shura in the , Berena remained with Gromnir Il-Khan while he barricaded himself within the citys castle. She fought alongside Gromnir when he was confronted by their divine half-brother, Abdel Adrian and his companions.
